About Aviation Test Center

This comprehensive aviation knowledge testing platform is designed to help pilots, aviation students, and professionals master essential aviation concepts across multiple disciplines.

Features

  • 1507 carefully curated questions
  • 15 major aviation knowledge categories
  • Detailed explanations and rationales
  • Progress tracking and performance analytics
  • Mobile-responsive design
  • Timed test sessions

Test Categories

Aircraft Performance: Performance calculations, V-speeds, takeoff/landing distances
Air Law: Regulations, procedures, legal requirements
AON Aviation Knowledge: Advanced concepts and specialized knowledge
Flight Planning & Monitoring: Navigation, fuel planning, weather analysis
General Navigation: Navigation principles, charts, position fixing
Human Performance & Limitations: Aviation physiology, human factors, CRM
Instrumentation: Aircraft instruments, displays, cockpit procedures
Mass & Balance: Weight and balance calculations, center of gravity
Meteorology & Weather: Weather systems, aviation meteorology, hazards
Operational Procedures: SOPs, emergency protocols, safety management
Radio Navigation: Navigation aids, radio systems, instrument approaches
